Question
========
What was the number of trips the plane identified in part c) made in January?


Solution
========
The plane N725MQ departed 65 times from a New York City airport in January 2013. We can extract this information using

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
NYCFlights %>%
  filter( tailnum == "N725MQ", month == 1 ) %>%
  summarize( Number_of_Flights = n() )
```
